channel.title: Cerebral Security OÜ
channel.description: Recent content on Cerebral Security OÜ

item.title: Web Application Pentest
item.description: A Web Application Penetration Test is an essential process for identifying and evaluating vulnerabilities in web applications.

item.title: Internal Network Pentest
item.description: Internal Network Penetration Testing is a critical security practice aimed at identifying and addressing vulnerabilities within an organization’s internal network.

item.title: External Network Pentest
item.description: External Network Penetration Testing is a critical process that involves assessing the security of an organization’s external network infrastructure.

item.title: Mobile Application Pentest
item.description: Mobile Application Penetration Testing is a specialized process designed to identify and address security vulnerabilities in mobile applications.

item.title: Cloud Infrastructure Audit
item.description: A Cloud Infrastructure Audit is a comprehensive assessment process designed to evaluate the security, compliance, and performance of cloud-based infrastructure.

item.title: Red Team Engagements
item.description: Red Team Engagement is an advanced and comprehensive security assessment that simulates real-world, sophisticated cyber attacks to evaluate the effectiveness of an organization’s overall security posture.

item.title: Security Oriented Source Code Audit
item.description: A Security-Oriented Code Audit is an in-depth analysis of an organization’s source code to uncover security vulnerabilities, ensure adherence to coding standards, and mitigate potential risks.

item.title: Trainings
item.description: Security Training is a vital service designed to educate and empower organizations and their employees in various aspects of cybersecurity.

item.title: Bug Bounty Program Management
item.description: Our Bug Bounty Program Management service is designed to assist companies in effectively managing their bug bounty programs.

item.title: Hello World!
item.description: We recently added this blog to our website. From now on, we will share posts about our technical researches as well as explaining the theoretical topics of the security concept.

item.title: Furkan Senan
item.description: Security researcher with 9 years of experience working with reputed companies in EMEA and USA.

item.title: What Our Customers Are Saying About Cerebral Security
